meanings.definition: A compound found in plants that can inhibit the absorption of minerals in the body.
meanings.sent1: The phytins in the spinach may prevent the body from getting enough iron.
meanings.sent2: It is important to be aware of the phytins in certain foods that can affect mineral intake.
meanings.sent3: The phytins in the salad decided to play a trick on the body's mineral absorption.
meanings.sent4: The phytins acted like little mineral blockers, causing a disruption in nutrient absorption.
meanings.sent5: Beware of the sneaky phytins lurking in plants, hindering mineral absorption!
